Subjects

Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-023-06910-y Published online 24 January 2024

In the version of the article initially published, the Horizon 2020 grant number was incorrect and has now been amended to 654002 in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
